message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $14000. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product valued at $15000 for a competitive price. I look forward to your consideration.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, I'm looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $13000? I believe this would still provide me with a great deal while staying within my financial limits.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to consider your proposal. For the product, I would like to offer it at $13500. This is slightly above your proposed price but still below its full value. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
